Body:
Description: Hi Team,

We have given the Device control and Enforced Encryption demo to the customer.

They need to encrypt the External storage devices automatically. and they have to use that pendrive after encryption process completed only.

When user is connected any external storage device into their laptop. One wizard will open automatically and that wizard will take to the encrypting the pendrive.


The existing Solution is Drive Lock.

Can we achieve this on our solutions. 

Regards,
Sai
What We've Learned Updated: Client would like to use the EasyLock to encrypt USB devices and files within them. They wish to deploy the EasyLock automatically.
Next Steps Updated: Followed up with them by sending an e-mail with instructions on how to perform this action.
Next Steps Updated: Client requested a remote session to better understand how the easy lock works
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Sai Nachiappan
What We've Learned Updated: Went on a remote session with the customer and assisted by explaining and testing the Easylock on his device.
Next Steps Updated: Assisted the client in setting up the easy lock through global rights and groups as well as testing with a USB device.
